channel.title: Hugo on 苇原
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on 苇原

item.title: Hugo笔记
item.description: GitHub Repository New repostory > Repostory name: <yourusername> SSH Key $ cd ~/.ssh $ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C <youremail> Generating public/private rsa key pair. Enter file in which to save the key (/Users/your_user_directory/.ssh/id_rsa): Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase): <passphrase> Enter same passphrase again: <passphrase> 这步做完我才发现文件夹里不知道为什么有个去年生成的
